did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Thomas D. Satterwhite, 1815-1905, was an attorney in Pima County, Arizona and served as the Attorney General for Arizona in 1895-1896. This collection includes correspondence, legal papers, case material, notes and other papers, mainly relating to legal matters but some personal correspondence. Case files are lawsuits of various mining companies and individuals including Louis C. Hughes.
